messages.subject: OT Fundraiser for Pensacola Group
messages.msgSnippet: (Posted with permission from group moderators - ignore if not interested) Pensacola LIFE (Living In Freedom Everyday) Group (which is the only group in our
messages.messageBody:
(Posted with permission from group moderators - ignore if not interested)

Pensacola LIFE (Living In Freedom Everyday) Group (which is the only
group in our area that supports unschoolers) is hosting a Pampered
Chef fundraiser to pay for our new website for the year. If you are
interested in helping us out (or just need something from Pampered
Chef LOL!) you can place an order by going to my website
http://www.pamperedchef.biz/michellelr and click on "Order Products"
then put Pensacola Life in the field that says, "Host's first
name/Organization" (Don't put anything in the Last Name field).
Everyone that orders will get a free Season's Best Cookbook as my
personal thank you. If you have any questions just e-mail me or go to
the "conatct me" part of my webpage.

--
Michelle
aka Melbrigða
http://eventualknitting.blogspot.com
MedHS@yahoogroups.com - Homeschooling for the Medieval Recreationist
